Articles.Content:
Well i guess it's time to introduce myself. Irl i got the nickname the stache so that's how this profile got this name.

I've already managed to get 1 person landers go to the mun, minmus, duna and its moon ike, they all returned safely except for Gilble (his engine fell off ) Because of that i'm trying to get a 3 person lander over there but those designs aren't stable enough to not tip over. It would be awesome if i could get some examples of interplanetary landers. Also i'd like to know how to edit my profile picture since i'm unable to find out how :<

Welcome to the forums

It might be worth checking out the Spacecraft Exchange forum for interplanetary lander examples, however I do not know how many of the ships in there will still be relevant due to the proximity of the last game update.

There are a few forum privileges which are withheld from new users as a spam prevention measure, such as signature editing and attachment uploading. These privileges will be automatically given up to 30~ minutes after you make your 5th forum post

Happy Engineering!

Welcome to the forums El Stacho.

I haven't even tried to get to Minmus yet, so me going to planets is a while down the list.

Like Rich said, the Spacecraft Exchange section is excellent for getting lots of different ships for different uses and you could even contribute your own there.

Good luck flying your rockets.

Hi El Stacho, welcome to the community

The big rockets need careful balancing, or struts, or those new launch clamps, put a pair on so the rocket hangs between them, that works for me
Welcome aboard the highly combustible forum rocket, enjoy the ride.
